title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
When a default value is set in a list box of a report parameter and the default value is modified, the modified default value is not retained. When reopening the Edit Parameter dialog, the default value reverts back to the original value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc", and set "aa" as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify "aa" to "aaa", and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should remain unchanged after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc", and set "aa" as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify "aa" to "aaa", and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and confirm that the default value remains as "aaa".
